sentences.sentence: He is also suing the authors of a book about his elder brother's business dealings with the government.
sentences.translation: 他还起诉了一本关于他哥哥与政府生意往来的书的作者。

sentences.sentence: He will go on suing until automobile companies around the world are stopped from manufacturing his wiper, and then he can make it himself.
sentences.translation: 他将继续起诉，直到全世界的汽车公司都停止生产他的雨刷，然后他将自己生产它。
